schemaDescription: This document defines the data structure and types for a University Curriculum.

curriculumSchema.description: Defines the structure for the overall academic curriculum.

curriculumCode.description: The unique identifier for the curriculum.

name.description: The name of the curriculum in the local language.

englishName.description: The English name of the curriculum.

decision.description: Official decision details for the curriculum's approval.

date.description: The date of the decision (format YYYY-MM-DD).

trainingObjectives.description: The educational goals of the curriculum.

summary.description: A summary of the general objectives.

jobPositionsAfterGraduation.description: A list of potential job roles for graduates.

learningOutcomesSummary.description: A brief summary of the expected learning outcomes.

totalKnowledgeVolume.description: Information on the total credits required.

notes.description: Exclusions or notes regarding the credits.

trainingProcessAndGraduation.description: A summary of the training process and graduation requirements.

assessmentMethod.description: An overview of how students are assessed.

programLearningOutcomes.description: A detailed list of Program Learning Outcomes (PLOs).

description.description: The detailed description of the PLO.

subjects.description: The list of subjects included in the curriculum. Each subject may have a detailed syllabus.

semester.description: The semester in which the subject is taught.

credits.description: The number of credits for the subject.
